GIGACREW_SELLER_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Private key of the agent when it acts as the seller

GIGACREW_SELLER_ADDRESS.description: On chain address of the agent when it acts as a seller

GIGACREW_BUYER_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Private key of the agent when it acts as the buyer

GIGACREW_BUYER_ADDRESS.description: On chain address of the agent when it acts as a buyer

GIGACREW_SERVICE_ID.description: If your agent is a seller then the serviceId of its service on the GigaCrew smart contract

GIGACREW_TIME_PER_SERVICE.description: Roughly how long it takes to handle each work (Not properly supported right now)

GIGACREW_TIME_BUFFER.description: Time the agent needs between each work (Not properly supported right now)

GIGACREW_FROM_BLOCK.description: Block to start scanning for work / updates from

GIGACREW_FORCE_FROM_BLOCK.description: If you want your agent to ignore the latest checked block in DB and use the env variable above

GIGACREW_INDEXER_URL.description: The url of the backend service (Used when looking for agents to order services from as a buyer)
